segment.source: Dev Center Insider Program
segment.target: Dev Center Insider Program

segment.source: Try out new Dev Center features before they become available to all developers and let us know what you think.
segment.target: Try out new Dev Center features before they become available to all developers and let us know what you think.

segment.source: Dev Center Insider Program
segment.target: Dev Center Insider Program

segment.source: As a registered developer, you can help influence the functionality we make available in the Dev Center dashboard by joining the Dev Center Insider Program.
segment.target: As a registered developer, you can help influence the functionality we make available in the Dev Center dashboard by joining the Dev Center Insider Program.

segment.source: This program allows you to try out new features before they become available to all developers.
segment.target: This program allows you to try out new features before they become available to all developers.

segment.source: We encourage you to give us your feedback on these features by using the Feedback link in the bottom right corner of Dev Center.
segment.target: We encourage you to give us your feedback on these features by using the Feedback link in the bottom right corner of Dev Center.

segment.source: All of the feedback we receive from Dev Center Insiders will be read closely and given priority consideration.
segment.target: All of the feedback we receive from Dev Center Insiders will be read closely and given priority consideration.

segment.source: To join the program, opt in on the Account settings page in your Dev Center dashboard.
segment.target: To join the program, opt in on the Account settings page in your Dev Center dashboard.

segment.source: You can opt out at any time.
segment.target: You can opt out at any time.

segment.source: Important The terms of the App Developer Agreement apply to your participation in the program.
segment.target: Important The terms of the App Developer Agreement apply to your participation in the program.

segment.source: Please read them, particularly Exhibit I, before you join the program.
segment.target: Please read them, particularly Exhibit I, before you join the program.

segment.source: Keep in mind that the features made available exclusively to people in the Dev Center Insider Program may include experimental and early prerelease services.
segment.target: Keep in mind that the features made available exclusively to people in the Dev Center Insider Program may include experimental and early prerelease services.

segment.source: This means that these features often don’t have documentation available yet, and you may experience unintended results when using them.
segment.target: This means that these features often don’t have documentation available yet, and you may experience unintended results when using them.

segment.source: Here are some of the features that we’ve made available exclusively to members of the Dev Center Insider Program.
segment.target: Here are some of the features that we’ve made available exclusively to members of the Dev Center Insider Program.

segment.source: This list will change over time as new features are added (and as features introduced to the Insider Program are made available to everyone).
segment.target: This list will change over time as new features are added (and as features introduced to the Insider Program are made available to everyone).

segment.source: Dev Center Insider Program feature
segment.target: Dev Center Insider Program feature

segment.source: How Dev Center Insiders can try it
segment.target: How Dev Center Insiders can try it

segment.source: Date added
segment.target: Date added

segment.source: Device family availability: Manage device family availability for your app and see which packages will be offered to specific Windows 10 device families (and earlier OS versions, if applicable) in ranked order.
segment.target: Device family availability: Manage device family availability for your app and see which packages will be offered to specific Windows 10 device families (and earlier OS versions, if applicable) in ranked order.

segment.source: View this info and make your selections on the Packages page of an app’s submission.
segment.target: View this info and make your selections on the Packages page of an app’s submission.

segment.source: May 2016
segment.target: May 2016

segment.source: View your submitted feedback: View all of the feedback you’ve submitted to Dev Center, and get notifications when we’ve made changes based on your feedback.
segment.target: View your submitted feedback: View all of the feedback you’ve submitted to Dev Center, and get notifications when we’ve made changes based on your feedback.

segment.source: Under Account settings, click Submitted feedback in the left nav.
segment.target: Under Account settings, click Submitted feedback in the left nav.

segment.source: April 2016
segment.target: April 2016

segment.source: Life to date acquisition data: Now you can see the cumulative total acquisitions for your apps and IAPs.
segment.target: Life to date acquisition data: Now you can see the cumulative total acquisitions for your apps and IAPs.

segment.source: View this info in an app's Acquisitions report and IAP acquisitions report.
segment.target: View this info in an app's Acquisitions report and IAP acquisitions report.

segment.source: April 2016
segment.target: April 2016

segment.source: Page history for multi-user accounts: Account owners can access detailed browsing history for any additional users they’ve added to the account.
segment.target: Page history for multi-user accounts: Account owners can access detailed browsing history for any additional users they’ve added to the account.

segment.source: On the Manage users page, click the link shown under “Last activity” for the user whose browsing history you’d like to review.
segment.target: On the Manage users page, click the link shown under “Last activity” for the user whose browsing history you’d like to review.

segment.source: April 2016
segment.target: April 2016

segment.source: New dashboard design: Get an updated view of your apps and key metrics, all in one place.
segment.target: New dashboard design: Get an updated view of your apps and key metrics, all in one place.

segment.source: The new design will appear on your dashboard overview page.
segment.target: The new design will appear on your dashboard overview page.

segment.source: March 2016
segment.target: March 2016
